67 static int _drop_cluster_count;

69 static auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray prev_clusters; // previous clusters not yet fully matched
70 static auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray matched_clusters; // matching clusters from prev segments

97 void publishNMEA(const ros::Publisher *in_publisher,
98  const auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray &in_clusters)
99 {
100  for(auto cluster : in_clusters.clusters)
101  {
102  in_publisher->publish(cluster.nmea_msg);

105 
116 vector<ClusterPtr> clusterCloud(const PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_cloud_ptr,
117  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr out_cloud_ptr,
118  auvlab_msgs::Centroids &in_out_centroids,
119  double in_max_cluster_distance = 0.5,
120  std::string nmea_msg_header = "$PYXOB")
121 {
122  //cout << "in_cloud_ptr->points.size() " << in_cloud_ptr->points.size() << endl;
123 
124 
125  search::KdTree<PointType>::Ptr tree(new search::KdTree<PointType>);
126 
127  // create 2d pointcloud
128  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr cloud_2d(new PointCloud<PointType>);
129  copyPointCloud(*in_cloud_ptr, *cloud_2d);
130  // flatten cloud
131  for (size_t i=0; i<cloud_2d->points.size(); i++)
132  {
133  cloud_2d->points[i].z = 0;
134  }
135 
136 
137  if (cloud_2d->points.size() > 0)
138  tree->setInputCloud(cloud_2d);
139 
140  // extract clusters from point cloud and save indices in cluster_indices
141  vector<PointIndices> cluster_indices;
142  EuclideanClusterExtraction<PointType> ec;
143  ec.setClusterTolerance(in_max_cluster_distance);
144  ec.setMinClusterSize(_cluster_size_min);
145  ec.setMaxClusterSize(_cluster_size_max);
146  ec.setSearchMethod(tree);
147  ec.setInputCloud(cloud_2d);
148  ec.extract(cluster_indices);
149 
150  //vector<PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr > clusters;
151 
152  // Cluster Points
153  //unsigned int k = 0;
154  vector<ClusterPtr> clusters;
155 
156  //cout << "cluster_indices.size() " << cluster_indices.size() << endl;
157 
158  for (auto it = cluster_indices.begin(); it != cluster_indices.end(); ++it)
159  {
160  ClusterPtr cluster(new Cluster());
161  cluster->SetCloud(in_cloud_ptr, it->indices, _sensor_header, cluster_id, "",
162  nmea_msg_header, sweep_count);
163  clusters.push_back(cluster);
164 
165  cluster_id++;
166  }
167 
168  return (clusters);
169 
170 
171 }
172 
181 void matchClusters(vector<ClusterPtr> &in_clusters,
182  vector<ClusterPtr> &in_out_clusters)
183 {
184  vector<ClusterPtr> track_clusters; // vector of Cluster object type returned from clusterCloud
185  // check in_out_clusters for aged out clusters
186  //cout << "sweep_count: " << sweep_count << endl;
187  for(int i=0; i<in_out_clusters.size(); i++)
188  {
189  int last_seen = sweep_count - in_out_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen();
190  //cout << "sweep_count: " << sweep_count << " last_seen: " << last_seen << endl;
191  //cout << "in_out_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen(): " << in_out_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen() << endl;
192  //cout << "last_seen: " << last_seen << " drop_cluster_count: " << _drop_cluster_count << endl;
193  if (last_seen >= _drop_cluster_count)
194  {
195  //cout << "del in_out_clusters[i]->GetID(): " << in_out_clusters[i]->GetID() << endl;
196  if(i>0)
197  {
198  int del = i - 1;
199  in_out_clusters.erase(in_out_clusters.begin()+del);
200  }
201  else
202  in_out_clusters.erase(in_out_clusters.begin());
203  }
204  }
205 
206 
207  for(int i=0; i<in_clusters.size(); i++)
208  {
209  float dist = _cluster_seg_thresh;
210  int best_match = -1;
211  for(int j=0; j<in_out_clusters.size(); j++)
212  {
213  float this_dist = euclideanDistance(in_out_clusters[j]->GetCentroidPoint(),
214  in_clusters[i]->GetCentroidPoint());
215  if(this_dist < dist)
216  {
217  best_match = j;
218  dist = this_dist; // update threshold
219  }
220  } // end for
221 
222  if(best_match >=0)
223  {
224  /*
225  cout << "best_match " << best_match << endl;
226  cout << "in_out_clusters[best_match]->GetID() "
227  << in_out_clusters[best_match]->GetID() << endl;
228  cout << "in_out_clusters[best_match]->GetLastSeen() "
229  << in_out_clusters[best_match]->GetLastSeen() << endl;
230  cout << "before match: in_clusters[i]->GetID() " << in_clusters[i]->GetID() << endl;
231  cout << "before match: in_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen() "
232  << in_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen() << endl;
233  */
234  // change cluster new cluster id to matched cluster id
235  in_clusters[i]->SetID(in_out_clusters[best_match]->GetID());
236  track_clusters.push_back(in_clusters[i]);
237  //cout << "after match: in_clusters[i]->GetID() " << in_clusters[i]->GetID() << endl;
238  //cout << "after match: in_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen() "
239  // << in_clusters[i]->GetLastSeen() << endl;
240  }
241  else
242  {
243  //in_out_clusters.push_back(in_clusters[i]); //
244  track_clusters.push_back(in_clusters[i]);
245  }
246  } // end for
247 
248  // if no tracked clusters copy current clusters into tracked
249  if(in_out_clusters.size() < 1)
250  {
251  //cout << "Set current clusters to tracked clusters" << endl;
252  in_out_clusters = in_clusters;
253  //cout << "new tracked clusters size: " << in_out_clusters.size() << endl;
254  }
255 
256  else
257  {
258  // clear in_out_clusters
259  //in_out_clusters.clear();
260 
261  //cout << "before adding track_clusters to in_out_clusters: " << in_out_clusters.size() << endl;
262  // Push all new tracked clusters into in_out_clusters
263  for(int i=0; i<track_clusters.size(); i++)
264  in_out_clusters.push_back(track_clusters[i]);
265 
266  //cout << "after adding track_clusters to in_out_clusters: " << in_out_clusters.size() << endl;
267 
268  }
269 
270 
271 
272 }
273 
283 void segmentCloud(const PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_cloud_ptr,
284  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr out_cloud_ptr,
285  auvlab_msgs::Centroids &in_out_centroids,
286  auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray &in_out_clusters,
287  std::string nmea_msg_header)
288 {
289  // Cluster the pointcloud by the distance of the points using different thresholds
290  // This helps with clustering at larger distances. See adaptive clustering for more info
291  // thresholds are based off empirical evidence, further study required for larger distances
292 
293  // 0 => 0-20m d=0.5
294  // 1 => 20-50 d=1.0
295  // 2 => 50-100 d=1.5
296  // 3 => 100-300 d=2.0
297  // 4 => >300 d=3.0
298 
299  vector<ClusterPtr> all_clusters; // vector of Cluster object type returned from clusterCloud
300 
301  if(!_use_multiple_thres)
302  {
303  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
304 
305  for (unsigned int i=0; i<in_cloud_ptr->points.size(); i++)
306  {
307  PointType current_point;
308  current_point.x = in_cloud_ptr->points[i].x;
309  current_point.y = in_cloud_ptr->points[i].y;
310  current_point.z = in_cloud_ptr->points[i].z;
311 
312  cloud_ptr->points.push_back(current_point);
313  }
314 
315  all_clusters = clusterCloud(cloud_ptr, out_cloud_ptr, in_out_centroids,
316  _clustering_distance, nmea_msg_header);
317 
318  }
319 
320  //cout << "****** Start: all_clusters.size() " << all_clusters.size() << endl;
321 
322  matchClusters(all_clusters, tracked_clusters);
323 
324  //cout << "****** Finish: tracked_clusters.size() " << tracked_clusters.size() << endl;
325  //cout << "****** Finish: all_clusters.size() " << all_clusters.size() << endl;
326 
327  // final pointcloud to be published
328  for (unsigned int i=0; i<all_clusters.size(); i++)
329  //for (unsigned int i=0; i<tracked_clusters.size(); i++)
330  {
331  *out_cloud_ptr += *all_clusters[i]->GetCloud();
332  //*out_cloud_ptr += *tracked_clusters[i]->GetCloud();
333 
334  PointType center_point = all_clusters[i]->GetCentroidPoint();
335  //PointType center_point = tracked_clusters[i]->GetCentroidPoint();
336  geometry_msgs::Point centroid;
337  centroid.x = center_point.x;
338  centroid.y = center_point.y;
339  centroid.z = center_point.z;
340 
341  if (all_clusters[i]->IsValid())
342  //if (tracked_clusters[i]->IsValid())
343  {
344  in_out_centroids.points.push_back(centroid);
345 
346  auvlab_msgs::CloudCluster cloud_cluster;
347  all_clusters[i]->ToROSMessage(_sensor_header, cloud_cluster);
348  //tracked_clusters[i]->ToROSMessage(_sensor_header, cloud_cluster);
349  in_out_clusters.clusters.push_back(cloud_cluster);
350  //cout << "cloud cluster id: " << cloud_cluster.id << endl;
351  }
352  }
353 
354 }
360 void publishCloud(const ros::Publisher *in_publisher,
361  const PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_cloud_to_publish_ptr)
362 {
363  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 cloud_msg;
364  toROSMsg(*in_cloud_to_publish_ptr, cloud_msg);
365  cloud_msg.header = _sensor_header;
366  in_publisher->publish(cloud_msg);
367 }
368 
374 void filterCloud(const PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_cloud_ptr,
375  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr out_cloud_ptr, const double in_distance)
376 {
377  out_cloud_ptr->points.clear();
378  for (unsigned int i=0; i<in_cloud_ptr->points.size(); i++)
379  {
380  float origin_distance = sqrt(pow(in_cloud_ptr->points[i].x, 2) +
381  pow(in_cloud_ptr->points[i].y, 2));
382  if (origin_distance > in_distance)
383  {
384  out_cloud_ptr->points.push_back(in_cloud_ptr->points[i]);
385  }
386  }
387 }
388 
395 void downsampledCloud(const PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_cloud_ptr,
396  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr out_cloud_ptr, float in_leaf_size = 0.2)
397 {
398  VoxelGrid<PointType> vg;
399  vg.setInputCloud(in_cloud_ptr);
400  vg.setLeafSize((float) in_leaf_size, (float) in_leaf_size, (float) in_leaf_size);
401  vg.filter(*out_cloud_ptr);
402 }
403 
408 void markers(auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray in_cluster_array)
409 {
410  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray markers_array;
411  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray text_markers_array;
412 
413  //cout << "in_cluster_array.clusters.size() :" << in_cluster_array.clusters.size() << endl;
414 
415  for(int i=0; i < in_cluster_array.clusters.size(); i++)
416  {
417  //cout << "in_cluster_array.clusters[i].id: " << in_cluster_array.clusters[i].id << endl;
418  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
419  //marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
420  marker.header.stamp = _sensor_header.stamp;
421  marker.header.frame_id = _sensor_header.frame_id;
422  marker.header.seq = _sensor_header.seq;
423  marker.ns = "clustering";
424  marker.id = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].id; //
425  marker.color.a = 1.0;
426  marker.color.r = 1.0;
427  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::LINE_STRIP;
428  marker.scale.x = 1.0; // point width, scale.y = point height
429  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(1.3);
430  //marker.text = to_string(i);
431  marker.scale.z = 1.0;
432 
433  visualization_msgs::Marker text_marker;
434  text_marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::TEXT_VIEW_FACING;
435  text_marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
436  text_marker.header = _sensor_header;
437  text_marker.ns = "text_clustering";
438  text_marker.id = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].id;
439  text_marker.scale.z = 10.0; // change for text scale in RVIZ
440  text_marker.color.a = 1.0;
441  text_marker.color.g = 1.0;
442  text_marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(1.3);
443  text_marker.text = to_string(in_cluster_array.clusters[i].id);
444 
445  text_marker.pose.position.x = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].max_point.point.x + 3;
446  text_marker.pose.position.y = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].centroid_point.point.y;
447  text_marker.pose.position.z = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].centroid_point.point.z;
448  text_marker.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
449  text_marker.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
450  text_marker.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
451  text_marker.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
452  text_markers_array.markers.push_back(text_marker);
453 
454  for(int j=0; j<in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points.size(); j++)
455  {
456  geometry_msgs::Point p;
457  p.x = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[j].x;
458  p.y = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[j].y;
459  p.z = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[j].z;
460  marker.points.push_back(p);
461  }
462  geometry_msgs::Point p;
463  p.x = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[0].x;
464  p.y = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[0].y;
465  p.z = in_cluster_array.clusters[i].convex_hull.polygon.points[0].z;
466 
467  marker.points.push_back(p);
468  markers_array.markers.push_back(marker);
469 
470  }
471  _marker_array_pub.publish(markers_array);
472  _text_marker_array_pub.publish(text_markers_array);
473 }
474 
475 void pc_callback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstPtr& in_cloud)
476 {
477  if (!_using_cloud)
478  {
479  _using_cloud = true;
480 
481  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr current_cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
482  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr filtered_cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
483  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr downsampled_cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
484  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr clustered_cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
485 
486  auvlab_msgs::Centroids centroids; // current segment centroids
487  auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray cloud_clusters; // current segments clusters
488 
489  fromROSMsg(*in_cloud, *current_cloud_ptr);
490  _sensor_header = in_cloud->header;
491 
492  if (_filter_cloud)
493  {
494  filterCloud(current_cloud_ptr, filtered_cloud_ptr, _remove_points);
495  }
496  else
497  {
498  filtered_cloud_ptr = current_cloud_ptr;
499  }
500 
501  if (_downsampled_cloud)
502  {
503  downsampledCloud(filtered_cloud_ptr, downsampled_cloud_ptr, _leaf_size);
504  }
505  else
506  {
507  downsampled_cloud_ptr = filtered_cloud_ptr;
508  }
509 
510  segmentCloud(downsampled_cloud_ptr, clustered_cloud_ptr, centroids, cloud_clusters,
511  _nmea_msg_header);
512 
513  sweep_count++;
514  // cluster_cloud publisher (raw cloud publisher)
515  publishCloud(&_pub_cluster_cloud, clustered_cloud_ptr);
516 
517  centroids.header = _sensor_header;
518  publishCentroids(&_centroid_pub, centroids, _output_frame, _sensor_header);
519 
520  // Cloud clusters message publisher
521  cloud_clusters.header = _sensor_header;
522  publishCloudClusters(&_pub_clusters_message, cloud_clusters, _output_frame, _sensor_header);
523  publishNMEA(&_pub_nmea_message, cloud_clusters); //
524 
525  // Visualization
526  if (_viz)
527  {
528  markers(cloud_clusters);
529  }
530 
531  _using_cloud = false;
532  }
533 }
534 
535 
536 int main(int argc, char **argv)
537 {
538  // Init ROS
539  ros::init (argc, argv, "cluster");
540  ros::NodeHandle nh;
541  ros::NodeHandle private_nh("~");
542 
543  string pc_topic;
544 
545  if(private_nh.getParam("pc_topic", pc_topic))
546  {
547  ROS_INFO("euclidean_cluster > Setting pc_topic to %s", pc_topic.c_str());
548  }
549  else
550  {
551  ROS_INFO("euclidean_cluster > No pointcloud received, defaulting to velodyne_points, use _pc_topic = /topic to set your points topic");
552  pc_topic = "/velodyne_points";
553  }
554 
555  _pub_cluster_cloud = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(pc_topic + "/cluster_cloud", 100);
556  _centroid_pub = nh.advertise<auvlab_msgs::Centroids>(pc_topic + "/cluster_centroids", 1);
557  _pub_clusters_message =
558  nh.advertise<auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray>(pc_topic + "/detection/raw_cloud_clusters", 1);
559  _pub_matched_clusters_msg =
560  nh.advertise<auvlab_msgs::CloudClusterArray>(pc_topic + "/detection/matched_clusters", 1);
561  //_pub_matched_clusters_cloud =
562  // nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(pc_topic + "/matched_clusters_cloud", 100);
563  _pub_nmea_message = nh.advertise<nmea_msgs::Sentence>("/nmea_to_send", 100);
564  _marker_array_pub = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(pc_topic + "/chull_markers", 100);
565  _text_marker_array_pub = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(pc_topic + "/text_markers", 100);
566 
567  _using_cloud = false;
568 
569 
570 
571  // Init tuning parameters
572  private_nh.param("filter_cloud", _filter_cloud, false);
573  ROS_INFO("[%s] filter_cloud: %d", __APP_NAME__, _filter_cloud);
574  private_nh.param("remove_points", _remove_points, 0.0);
575  ROS_INFO("[%s] remove_points: %f", __APP_NAME__, _remove_points);
576  private_nh.param("downsampled_cloud", _downsampled_cloud, false);
577  ROS_INFO("[%s] downsampled_cloud %d", __APP_NAME__, _downsampled_cloud);
578  private_nh.param("leaf_size", _leaf_size, 0.0);
579  ROS_INFO("[%s] leaf_size %f", __APP_NAME__, _leaf_size);
580  private_nh.param("cluster_size_min", _cluster_size_min, 20);
581  ROS_INFO("[%s] cluster_size_min %d", __APP_NAME__, _cluster_size_min);
582  private_nh.param("cluster_size_max", _cluster_size_max, 100000);
583  ROS_INFO("[%s] cluster_size_max %d", __APP_NAME__, _cluster_size_max);
584  private_nh.param("clustering_distance", _clustering_distance, 0.75);
585  ROS_INFO("[%s] clustering_distance %f", __APP_NAME__, _clustering_distance);
586  private_nh.param("use_multiple_thres", _use_multiple_thres, false);
587  ROS_INFO("[%s] use_multiple_thres %d", __APP_NAME__, _use_multiple_thres);
588  private_nh.param<string>("output_frame", _output_frame, "velodyne");
589  ROS_INFO("[%s] output_frame: %s", __APP_NAME__, _output_frame.c_str());
590  private_nh.param("cluster_seg_thresh", _cluster_seg_thresh, 1.0);
591  ROS_INFO("[%s] cluster_seg_thresh: %f", __APP_NAME__, _cluster_seg_thresh);
592  private_nh.param("drop_cluster_count", _drop_cluster_count, 5);
593  ROS_INFO("[%s] drop_cluster_count: %d", __APP_NAME__, _drop_cluster_count);
594  private_nh.param<string>("nmea_msg_header", _nmea_msg_header, "PYXOB");
595  _nmea_msg_header = "$" + _nmea_msg_header;
596  ROS_INFO("[%s] nmea_msg_header: %s", __APP_NAME__, _nmea_msg_header.c_str());
597  private_nh.param("viz", _viz, false);
598  ROS_INFO("[%s] viz: %d", __APP_NAME__, _viz);
599 
600  // Subscribe to the input point cloud 'pc_topic'
601  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe(pc_topic, 100, pc_callback);
602 
603  // Spin
604  ros::spin();
605 }
